WorldClim V2 global data (Fick & Hijmans, 2017) were downloaded from a public repository online ( https://www.worldclim.org/). Updated in July 2016, these data contain average monthly climatic measurements, representative of the period 1970–2000. The spatial resolution used for the maps of Brazil and South America was of 10 minutes (
≈ 340
km
2
). The spatial resolution used for the maps of Honduras was 2.5 minutes (
≈ 25
km
2
). These data are not made available in this manuscript due to license restrictions, but are publicly available at WorldClim webpage ( https://www.worldclim.org/). See Supporting Information S2 Text for more details.
